table_caption: Demographic and clinical measures for participants in Alzheimer’s Disease Neuroimaging Initiative (ADNI3), subdivided by diffusion-weighted MRI (dMRI) protocol.
table_foot: We report the average age, Mini-Mental State Examination (MMSE), Clinical Dementia Rating scale sum-of-boxes (CDR-sob), and AD Assessment scale 13 (ADAS-cog) measures, and their standard deviations. *Data not available for all participants: MMSE N = 315; CDR-sob N = 316 and ADAS-cog N = 278. +We recognize the limitations of these assessments as proxy measures of specific cognitive abilities (Balsis et al., 2015).
